specials.dish: Three Flavor Whole Fish w/ Shrimp and Scallops
specials.description:
Our popular one to two pound whole fish-of-the-day, lightly battered and
                      deep fried to seal in the flavor, served over our special three-flavor vegetable
                      stir-fry, topped with large shrimp and sea scallops.

appetizers.description:
Minced pork, chicken and shrimp or crab, water chestnut, green onion and
                      seasonings in a steamed wonton, w/ dim sum sauce.

soups.description:
Sliced chicken or fish, fresh button mushrooms in coconut cream soup seasoned
                      with galangal, lemon grass, kaffir lime leaves, exotic spices, topped with cilantro.

noodles.description:
Thin rice noodles pan-fried in a tamarind sauce with meat of choice, bean
                      sprouts, green onion and egg. Garnished with peanuts, bean sprouts, green onion
                      or chives, and lime.
